summary: A clueless boss has no idea what to do with his mundane office worker whose refusal of duties only gets worse each passing minute.
cast: David Paymer|Crispin Glover|Glenne Headly|Maury Chaykin|Joe Piscopo|Seymour Cassel|Carrie Snodgress|Dick Martin|Greta Danielle Newgren|Ken Murakami|Josh Kornbluth|Nick Scoggin|Stoney Burke|Terry Allen Jones|Stu Klitsner|Pete Marvel|Catherine DiNapoli|Louis Landman|Robert Ernst|James Carraway|Tim Wiggins|Howie Gordon|Olivia Parker|Susan Renati|Truman Chao|Karin Argoud|Victoria Smith
keywords: office worker|public records office|fired from the job|employer employee relationship|insubordination
title: Bartleby
